name: Learn to Fly (BTP-3)
description:
Penguins don't fly. Or do they?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game is inspired by the old "Learn to Fly" flash game. This is my second game jam and I wanted to learn pixel art and unity2d because I only made 3d games before.

Sadly I did not have much time for the jam during the week, so I just focused on the learning aspects (pixel art, animations, 2d) and not on the game itself. I'm happy with my first 2d results, but the game is not really good. :/

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: A/LeftArrow   D/RightArrow
